639260.name: Rival Books of Aster - Theurgia Goetia Starter Deck
639260.description:
This DLC contains 30 additional cards for the game Rival Books of Aster, and is a pre-built ready to play deck for the House Theurgia Goetia.

Rival Books of Aster does NOT contain randomized booster packs. Play for free with a starter deck of your choice, and expand your collection with DLC packs containing known-quantities of cards.

THIS DLC UNLOCKS THE ABILITY TO BUILD THEURGIA GOETIA HOUSE DECKS


Once purchased, all cards can be used to customize your own decks.

*This is NOT a randomized booster pack. Exact content listed below. See screenshots for card details.

13 Theurgia Goetia House Cards
  • Spreading Fire
  • Northern Stores
  • Western Wind
  • Water Portal
  • The Fire Tower
  • Armany
  • Vadriel
  • Orvich
  • Bedary
  • Demoriel of the North
  • The Western Pool
  • Southern Shift
  • Earth Magic

17 Common Cards (playable by any house)
  • Persiel
  • Mador
  • Dubilon
  • Surgat's Gate
  • Monandor
  • Surgat
  • Ermosiel
  • Mathon
  • Balsur
  • Cabarim
  • Serviel
  • Sirchade's Army
  • Camiel
  • Tafrac
  • Nadroc
  • Carifas
  • Netos

英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
